Li Europan lingues es membres del sam familie. Lor separat existentie es un myth. [/li][li icon_name="pixicon-square-check" icon_color="custom" user_icon_color="#13c7d6"]Europe uses the same vocabulary.[/li][li icon_name="pixicon-square-check" icon_color="custom" user_icon_color="#13c7d6"]English person, it will seem like simplified English.[/li][/list][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" gap="20" content_placement="middle" parallax="content-moving" parallax_image="2916" parallax_speed_bg="2.0" color_style="light" css=".vc_custom_1511365740901{padding-top: 65px !important;padding-bottom: 135px !important;background-position: center;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_empty_space height="15px"][vc_custom_heading text="We Are Rigel Business" font_container="tag:h2|font_size:32px|text_align:left|color:%23ffffff|line_height:42px" google_fonts="font_family:Fjalla%20One%3Aregular|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal"][vc_custom_heading text="Omnicos directe al desirabilite de un nov lingua franca: On refusa continuar payar custosi traductores.
